title: So Zed or Shen?
body: So I've been thinking about the Shen v Zed rivalry, and I was wondering who you guys think will win. I want to say Shen, just because the good guys almost always win, but idk. What do you guys think?

Technically, Zed already won when he dismantled the Kinkou.

We don't really know who Shen is anymore. 

Before Zed was the Eye of Twilight. He was the leader of the Kinkou, who was noted for his complete emotionlessness regarding tactical decisions. This was put to the test by torturing and killing Shen's father in front of him, while he did not react. 

With Zed's lore, it was said that Zed killed Shen's father(also Shen and Zed's former master and former leader of the kinkou). Zed also already defeated Shen with his forbbiden lore, and all evidence shows he's only gotten stronger from that point. 

So I would say Zed barring further information regarding Shen's current status in the lore.

Also it's important to note that Zed isn't necessarily the total bad guy, and Shen isn't necessarily the absolute good guy. The Kinkou is an order based upon upholding their idea of balance, and they employ assassin's to that end. While they may do works of good, they also are killers who put people to death to uphold their own ideological view. 

And Zed while being focused on power and obviously a killer, also seems to be somewhat of an egalitarian and one who believes in the chasing of knowledge as opposed to the hoarding and banning of it.  Also he comes to his hate of the Kinkou pretty honestly considering he was treated pretty unfairly by them.
Zed doesn't kill Shen's father in the lore he just kills the Master.
"An orphan, Zed was taken in and trained by a great ninja master. Only one other student appeared to be Zed's equal - the master's son,  Shen."

that doesn't say anything about Shen's father... all it says is Zed's father died and that Shen and Zed were equals

however,
"the assembled ninjas heard Zed cry out in pain. Mysteriously, he emerged unscathed, and threw the severed head of the master at Shen's feet."

I'll break the sentence down for ya. 

Zed was taken in by a great ninja master.
Only 1 of the master's students was Zed's equal.
That 1 student was the master's son who was named Shen. 

Also later his bio says:

"Now armed with a secret edge, he challenged Shen, and this time he defeated the master's son."

Shen was the ninja master's son in Zed's bio.

Oh shit im an idiot I didnt catch that but besides the point Shen's father still only dies in one way... in Shen's lore it only says that his father was tortured not tortured and killed...you can have one without the other... in terms of lore Shen's father only dies from the hand of Zed

I really think they need to redo Shen's lore to have it all be coherent. 

Also(and this is off-topic). But I've always been afraid that what Riot had planned was that the Ninja master was secretly evil and had groomed Zed as a physical replacement for his own failing body, and that what happened in the temple was that the ninja master had basically possessed Zed's body(hence the cry of pain but  no injuries) and then proceeded to rule openly as evil leaving his old identity(and now decapitated body) behind. 

I think Zed is a compelling character and would feel kinda ripped of if this was the case.

If they do clean up his lore i hope the keep the aspect of the Eye of Twilight were he watch and analyze everything without emotion which coincide with his ability to endure because that what translate into his gamplay, they ever watchful eye who must have awareness this is his ult and the enduring aspect is what make him a tank.
